Home.Description: Welcome to LFMReview! Share and read reviews about your teachers to improve the educational quality of your community.

FAQ.R1: LFMReviews is a site where you can write and read community reviews about different teachers in different years and subjects at LFM.
FAQ.R2: Most teachers from 6th to Terminal are available. However, you can help us enrich our list by sending us information about a teacher we havenâ€™t yet listed via the 'Add a teacher' tab.
FAQ.Q3: Will people know who posted the review?
FAQ.R3: No, all reviews are anonymous, no one will know who posted them. We only ask for your email address for database reasons and to prevent the creation of multiple accounts.
